review: While the processor is fast and works fine, I wanted to have the same functionality as my chromecast and thats not happening.  Can't get live events like NFL and Google Youtube doesn't allow for purchased movies to play.  I paid for the interview but couldn't watch it.  Overall, it's cheap and for $20 works similar to Roku.
author: Danny Sherman

review: no it didn't because I thought I would be able to watch some free movie shows and games without having to buy or sign up for upgrade very misleading
author: Anthony Ford

review: does everything I expected it to do. Love it!!
author: joelklite

review: Great additional to tv. Will purchase for all my televisions
author: Amazon Customer

review: I'm having a good time exploring this. Very easy to install. Seems like it was made for us untechies!
